title: Himi 379
lyrics:
M. ‘e 8,7, & 4.
Ko e ʻAho ʻo e ʻEiki
1.
Kainga, mou hanga hake;
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘oku haʻu,
Mo e ngaahi toko afe,
Mo e longoa’a fau.
Haleluia!
Kuo hoko mai ‘a e Hau.
2.
Ko hotau Misaia ‘ena,
Foki mei he Kolōlia:
‘A ia na’a nau tāmatea
Ma’atautolu ‘ofein
a
:
Ko e Lami
Naʻa ne ‘ave ‘etau hia.
3.
Ko e ngaahi matakafo
‘Oku kei ‘ilonga na:
Ko e hoka ‘e he tao,
He kalauni talatala,
Mo e kofu
Kuo pani ta’ata’a.
4.
Hono ‘ikai fiefia
Si’i fa’ahinga fai lelei;
‘I heʻenau siofia
Honau ‘eiki, ‘oku kei
Ko e Lami
Kuo toki tāmate’i.
5.
Kuo loa ‘ene puli
Ka nau tui pē ki ai.
Pea ko eni kuo ha’u ni
Hangē ‘ene lea na’e fai,
“Te te ha’u pe
Homou ‘ave ki he Langi.”
6.
Ifi ai ‘a e talupite
Fai ‘a e vakavakaō,
Puna hotau laumālie,
Ō mo e kau ‘āngelo;
Hū ai leva
Ki he potu mālōlō.*
